channel.title: Stranger Foods
channel.description: A catalogue of recipes Tom has made.

item.title: Beef curry
item.description:
Beef curry



Make our easy beef curry and serve with a hunk of naan bread to mop up the delicious juices. If you prefer it less spicy, simply add less chilli powder..

item.title: BBQ cauliflower pizza
item.description:
BBQ cauliflower pizza



A little tip: if you roll out your pizza dough and find it isn't cooperating - either because it's not molding into the shape you want, or if it presents little rips and tears - don't worry about it. Just collect it all together in a ball, knead it a few more times until the dough is smooth, and try again. Just remember to keep your surface and rolling pin nice and floured, so it doesn't stick..

item.title: One pot creamy cajun chicken pasta
item.description:
One pot creamy cajun chicken pasta



Cook a complete dinner in one pot with this Creamy Cajun Chicken Pasta, using mostly pantry-stable items. Perfect for busy weeknights! .

item.title: Pesto shrimp pasta
item.description:
Pesto shrimp pasta



This Pesto Shrimp Pasta is a restaurant quality meal that you can make in under 30 minutes! The perfect quick weeknight meal..

item.title: Slow-cooked beef ragout
item.description:
Slow-cooked beef ragout



Not to be confused with the Italian ragu, which is a meat-based pasta sauce, this hearty, slow-cooked French-style stew is great for freezer-friendly batch cooking.
